title: GDF file format
content:
Hi everyone

I am doing to try out writing a tool to convert from shapefile format  
(.shp) to .gdf file (Tele Atlas implementation) but I don’t know gdf data structures. Can you send to me gdf data structures? I have read documentations at links following:  
 [http://www.ertico.com/en/links/links/gdf\_-\_geographic\_data\_files.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092107/http:/www.ertico.com/en/links/links/gdf_-_geographic_data_files.htm "http://www.ertico.com/en/links/links/gdf\_-\_geographic\_data\_files.htm")  
 [http://www.4d-technologies.com/writegdf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092107/http:/www.4d-technologies.com/writegdf/ "http://www.4d-technologies.com/writegdf/")  
But these documentations are difficult to me writing a tool to convert from shp file to gdf file. Have you got this tool or source code to gdf read and write? If this is a licence, how can I buy it?

Best regards

 [‹ Quark Problems / OT-fonts.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092107/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33707 "Go to previous forum topic") [Style-Linking Question from a Newbie ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092107/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33757 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tonygis
